properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 3:00PM EST until February 20 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...Snow on Thursday...

..Low pressure tracking from the northern Gulf of Mexico to the
Southeast Coast will bring snow to North Carolina and southern
Virginia on Thursday.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two
inches.

* WHERE...In Virginia, Grayson County. In North Carolina, Ashe
and Watauga Counties.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 PM EST THURSDAY
